link.title: Friendswood ISD » Comments Feed

meta.content: In order to help prevent the broader spread of COVID-19, Friendswood ISD is joining with districts across the region in closing next week, March 16-20. All school activities/events will be canceled. Continue to closely monitor…

meta.name: generator
meta.content: Powered by Slider Revolution 6.2.2 - responsive, Mobile-Friendly Slider Plugin for WordPress with comfortable drag and drop interface.

article.class: post-32369 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized no-post-thumbnail

div.p: In order to help prevent the broader spread of COVID-19, Friendswood ISD is joining with districts across the region in closing next week, March 16-20. All school activities/events will be canceled.
Continue to closely monitor communication from the district for additional information for both parents and FISD employees.

li.a: Friendswood ISD Brothers Make Face Shields For Healthcare Providers
FHS Theatre’s Matilda Brings Home 13 Tommy Tunes Nominations
